text: "Where you stumble and fall, there you will find gold." - Joseph Campbell. Don't let the fear of failing hold you back! Learn from it!

Check out these awesome teachings by Joseph Campbell about the power of myth and storytelling! #herosjourney
https://t.co/4vgXW4znL3
"The greatest obstacle to living is expectancy..The whole future lies in uncertainty; live immediately."-Seneca. Make this Wednesday great!
"Art is a wound turned in light." - Georges Braque.  We work with incarcerated and high-risk youth.  This quote shows how our work helps.
As David Orr said, "Hope is a verb with its sleeves rolled up." BLI would like to wish you all a happy Thursday and a hopeful outlook!
We would like to introduce Riley (right) and Star (left)! They are our video crew working on our crowdfunding video! https://t.co/81V5m86rVi
Our mission is to help people, through creative expression, discover fresh ideas and new perspectives on their lives.
Check out and bookmark our website to support our journey as we help others understand theirs! https://t.co/hUwBOq5sST
Help us on our own Hero's Journey! Like us on Facebook and stay updated on all our activities in more detail! https://t.co/ctEiLERDM2
We are excited to announce that we received a $1,000 grant from Wonder Keepers Storytelling Guild from Scio, Oregon! Thanks for the support!
The previous tweet is a quote from a counselor at Timber Ridge School.  Timber Ridge is one of the schools we do our program for!
“These kinds of programs are invaluable to the public schools and help us serve our students in very important ways.” Cindy Parke
We have officially received our 501 (c) 3 from the government. We are officially recognized as a non-profit!
Here are some behind the scenes shots of our crowd-funding video! It's almost ready and we are excited to share it! https://t.co/BS8SMJoLXD
We are a non-profit organization that helps people understand their potential through storytelling and art! Check us out on Facebook too!
@oregoniansgive thank you for the support! We are excited to continue working toward our goals and inspiring our community!
RT @oregoniansgive: #OregoniansGive celebrates the work of @Brave_Life_Init - Helping people navigate life's journey through story and art.
Had a great time doing the allies module with the lovely ladies of @OSUTheta! The masks look great! https://t.co/3lpwc9ZVNm
